storyInfo: By pure coincidence, Perfumer finds in Victoria an old tree long extinct in Minos.

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Father, Mother. I've been infected with Oripathy. Your line of work would never let an Infected take over, so now, I'm free to do what I want to do, aren't I?
attributes.name: Lena

attributes.content: I know I can't stay in our home any longer. I'll move out as soon as I can. Don't worry about me, I'm completely able to care for myself now, and I don't need to trouble my family for anything.
attributes.name: Lena

attributes.content: But if it's alright, could you leave my flower garden where it is? They're just plants. Oripathy won't mar their purity.
attributes.name: Lena

attributes.content: Please, let me say goodbye.
attributes.name: Lena

attributes.content: Winter.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: The aroma of sawdust from the firewood 'pon the altar.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Relics.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: The nose of clay and moss within the temple.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Nightfall.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: The scent of the thickets' dew in Helia's Mountains.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Sunset.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: The taste of honey.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Of honey?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: During my time in the Hall of the Twelve Heroes, I always made it each evening's custom to watch the sun set as I imbibed a glass of mead. The dusk through the glass was golden as honey was.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Oh... the flavor of a scene such as that. How greatly I yearn, so greatly.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Very unique, but very, very understandable too.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: That's why we've done this. Just describing a situation can easily let us make associations with scents that match the scene well.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: And vice versa. When we smell a clear scent, we'll associate it with the relevant scene.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: So, Miss Lena, you believe that the use of similar methods can rouse Miss Gloria's memories?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Scent has an emotionally evocative power. If the information within a scent is rich enough, then the brain will associate it with clearer direction too, and it's not out of the question it'll connect to what concrete memories it may.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: This may well be a reliable treatment method for Miss Gloria, in response to her condition.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Ah, I shall not interrogate your professional judgment, nor complain of the weight of these plant specimens. I only hold some questions.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Why do we not bring Miss Gloria back here with us, directly?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Heheh. As a Medic Operator with no fighting ability, I need others to accompany me when I'm going a ways away. You're the one I'm pulling along this time, Lady Priestess.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: As for why we can't bring Gloria back, it's a sad thing, but the state of her health doesn't let her travel long distances. Besides, bringing her into familiar surroundings may not do wholly positive things for her.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Just like in a play, a more unadulterated scenario resonates more easily with an audience's mood. Too great a mix of information may well make it hard for one to catch the important things.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Take right here, right now. I imagine you'd have a hard time giving an overall, unique impression for this city, in the midst of all these scents.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Quite true. Frigid air bites in my nose, mingled with dust and soot. It is selfsame as other modern cities I have visited.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: But I notice, too, in the air a faintly scattered scent out of the ordinary, with the perfume of cream and wheat—is this the fragrance of bread?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Hah-hah, hello, Miss! Please, take two and have a taste. On me.
attributes.name: Bakery Owner

attributes.content: I thank you greatly—such warm and exquisite flavor. I extol your craft from the heart.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Thanks for the kind words! If you're fond, would you mind spreading the word for me, then?
attributes.name: Bakery Owner

attributes.content: Assuredly! Such fine flavor deserves to be experienced by more—Miss Lena, would you sample one?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I'll be fine for now... You really do harmonize with people just like that, Pallas.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: To converse is a thing of pleasure. I may gain knowledge from it, and sharpen my thought.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: But our task here is to gather the necessary materials as quickly as possible. If we accidentally expose our Infected identity through enough contact with others, it'll mean unnecessary hassle in turn.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: If that girl knew we were Infected, would she have been as friendly as she was?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Darling Lena, assume no ill will in others before you meet them. As the great forebears said, 'even as you meet a century of wicked souls, ne'er conclude the century and first would then do evil.'
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: If that was the case, I can't see why our lives would be the way they are then.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Miss Lena...?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: No, don't mind it. I'm just being oversensitive.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: There're a lot of materials we need to get our mitts on. Let's seize the moment.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Judging by the thickness of the wayside bushes, this city's climate must lean on the drier side. Its average yearly rainfall is probably around the 500ml range.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: The ecology of plantlife here oughtn't be too complex. It seems we're in for a bit less work than I imagined.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I seem to have seen this tree in your greenhouse before, Miss Lena. Is it of the same kind?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Not at all. This one is a Victorian cypress, and the tree in the greenhouse is a Minoan fir. People might often confuse the two thanks to their scale leaves, but they're actually completely separate.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I knew of the perfuming, but not that you were so well-versed in botanic studies too. My.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Nature itself is an endlessly giving store of scents and sources. If you want be a good perfumer, you can't do without a knowledge of plants.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I've seen many a rare plant from Minos in your Convalescent Garden. Many were, to me, only names I had read in books before.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I imagine you too must long deeply for all the green that grows in Minos.
attributes.name: Pallas
Perfumer
attributes.content: Plants have their own charm, and that has nothing to do with where they are growing—

attributes.name: Perfumer
attributes.content: Strange, how do the tree ferns thrive even in such an environment here? Do they have tenders?
If I may be forthcoming, something you said has rather lingered on my mind.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Miss Lena, you left your home due to Oripathy too, didn't you?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Not a prominent scent, but has a base aroma much like air. I'll need to sample and take notes. Pallas, could you grab a #3 test tube for me—I'm sorry, what were you just saying?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: A #3 test tube. Is this it?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: No, the one to the right, a size larger. Yes. Thank you.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Hmm. Why did I leave my home...? It's complicated, I'll say that.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Too much time has passed to recall how I felt back then more than vaguely. I just remember a lot of regret and disappointment had piled up, and all that was left in the end was the idea of 'I have to leave home.'
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Every traveler has what they cannot help. In that respect, you and I surely have melancholies abound to share, hard as it is to tell them to others.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: You're overblowing it, Pallas. It's all bygones by now. I've found somewhere to belong and something of a career—there's not much regret to have, really.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: My dear countrywoman. Though I pull this ailing body far from native soil, I still can sense to this day the call of Minos's every alpine rock, every breadth of field and forest.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: There may be a day, I hope with all my heart, that we can return to our home—
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Sorry... that was careless of me.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Lena—
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Pallas, would you mind leaving the topic alone for now?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Lena?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: You never did anything wrong, it was just one accident, and then they took away everything you were, everything you were worth. You can understand that, can't you, with what you've gone through?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Do you treat that all like it's... nothing? Just little gripes and grudges we don't need to resent or let get to us?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: What I cannot deny is that these lands are especially ruthless to the Infected. I too once asked if this was unjust of fate, but in the end, faith and hope still triumphed over the resentment.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Lena, of course I have no right to tell you you should shed bad blood. I simply ask, of the soil that nurtured us, or perhaps of your friends and family—is there any attachment that still remains?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: You're right, you're exactly right. But what drove me from home wasn't Oripathy. It was my family who abandoned me when they had no use for me. It was the people who saw me and didn't care, the friends who found it all so funny.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: To this day, Minos is still about passing on all those romantic epics, the stories of heroes. What you and I have suffered, what all the Infected have suffered, could only ever be unsightly... errors in the tales.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Pallas, for you, Minos is a place worth cherishing. It's where your dreams and convictions lie. But to me, it's nothing but a name that I wish I could forget.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I'm sorry... I got flustered.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: No, I should be sorry. I am profuse with apology, that I roused your worst recollections.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: It's fine. Anyway, there's more important things to do now than get bogged down in unhappy memories.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Well spoken. We must find some meaning in the now, to dilute melancholies of days past...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: A daeluswood?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: An extinct tree, if I recall? Does it hold any special significance for you, Miss Lena?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: What... is a daeluswood doing here?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: On a hillside of bracken and weeds stands a lofty, ancient tree.

Its trunk is still arrow-straight, but not at all unyielding. Its rough bark appears weather-beaten. The sparse foliage resembles a tattered umbrella, only smatters of leaves left hanging on its branches.
The daeluswood. Grown in Minos, and only in Minos. Renowned for its timber sturdy beyond compare, a synonym for stalwart in poem and play.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: When Sargon invaded, the invaders wrought unbridled destruction on our culture so as to crush our faith, and this tree was one among the sacrifices.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: After our heroic soldiers repelled the invaders, not a soul in Minos ever saw such a tree again.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: If not for its accounts in old texts, the people might have thought it a species from legend. How can you be so sure that this tree before us is a daeluswood, Miss Lena?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Pallas... could I borrow your weapon for a moment?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: 'E'en by sword and by ax, no trace could be left.' So the epics noted. But one light chop here severed a branch.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: And the daeluswood's illustrations certainly didn't seem so thin and frail...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: The same plants growing in different environments can present extremely different characters. But it's just like how we wouldn't mistake a Liberi for a Savra, even though people's looks can vary so greatly.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: The leaves' sawtooth outline, the red veining around its edges, and their extremely short stalk. These features are all identical to the historic records.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Though the timber's looser and weaker thanks to the different surroundings, it's kept hold of its neat and detailed grain, and there's still oily resin left on the inside of the bark... There's no mistaking it.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: What's most important: this tree has the scent of Minos.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: A breeze blows past, the vegetation about them somber in the twilight season.
The frail old tree nods in the wind, as if greeting another fellow countryman who's come from afar.
Daeluswoods have been rumored long extinct, and this tree seems to be decades in age. But just how, I wonder, did it arrive in these foreign lands?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Maybe fowlbeasts carrying its fruit, maybe wind blowing its seeds. There's times when nature gives life wonderful opportunities, but it takes life with no mercy more frequently still.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Pallas, I'd like—to save this tree.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: But now isn't the season for trees to flower, and moving it, roots and all, is more unaskable still. In the face of it...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I may have a plan... I'm not too willing to do this, but I've got no other choice.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Pallas, back in Minos, did you ever act in the theater?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Huff, puff... This road is... treacherous and a half! What the devil are the city planners up to...? Ms. Lena, what makes you ask me to meet you here?
attributes.name: Wealthily-Dressed Man

attributes.content: Mr. William, it's been a while. I'm awfully sorry; it's difficult for Infected to show themselves in public, so I had no choice but for you to make the run.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Such a shame. Too many fools in these lands ridden about by their prejudices—no, not that I mean to offend your father. I paid him a visit not long ago, and he's still fit as a fiddle in his old age.
attributes.name: William

attributes.content: But as your good friend, Ms. Lena, I'm well aware of your worth—no, the worth of your perfumery. How's Oripathy meant to tarnish that?
attributes.name: William

attributes.content: Under your guidance, our firm's perfumes have been taking all Victoria by storm the moment they release! Annual turnover has passed three million Victorian pounds! It's simply art!
attributes.name: William

attributes.content: (All well and good. We know all you did was steal my recipes. If I'd never left home, would you have still dared?)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (Besides, just three million?)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (clears throat) Let me introduce you. This is Mr. William, my... friend, a perfume artisan famous in Victoria.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: And this is a fellow Minoan of mine, Pallas, who's in your line of work too.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Mr. William, I've heard much of you. Though I'd heard some tell in Minos too, I see today that you truly... truly do seem the part of an artist of perfumes!
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Good to meet you, good to meet you. I assume since we're in the same business, business is why Ms. Lena here introduces you?
attributes.name: William

attributes.content: It certainly is business, but to be clearer about it, I'm hoping you can help us out with something, seeing how we've been friends all this time.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Help you out? I...
attributes.name: William

attributes.content: This perfume is one of my works. I do not boast, but as a Minoan product, it is too a household name. I have plans to create a perfume brand with it at its core, too.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Mr. William, perfume is our trade, and selling it is our living. Our pursuit surely lies not only in money, but the hope of passing fragrance and happiness onto all corners of these lands—
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Haha... You make fine, fine sense. So—what exactly are you trying to get at?
attributes.name: William

attributes.content: A-hem. Ms. Pallas, Mr. William is a friend of mine. He won't mind frank talk from you. Tell him about your troubles.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (Get to the point! The point!)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Of course, of course. I should be candid in the presence of friends.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Mr. William, I'd like to bring my work to the Victorian market. The materials for this perfume are by and large no issue, but the most important ingredient, a kind of tree, formerly could only be found in Minos.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Perhaps it was some will from Above, that I should have found the same tree in this city too. Do look, please.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: This leaf is your main ingredient, then?
attributes.name: William

attributes.content: Definitely has a unique scent about it. In a perfume, it'd bring more overall calmness, classicalness. Unlike any wood-scented perfume on the market today.
attributes.name: William

attributes.content: A Minoan juniper. To find a mark of its growth in this city proves that it can adapt to this climate.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Therefore, I wish to contract for a plot of soil in this city to plant them in bulk. But as a foreign merchant, the procedures pose me great challenges. Thus I hope you may lend me a helping hand in this matter.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I would like to say, that's easier said than done, even with my connections.
attributes.name: William

attributes.content: Mr. William, since we are talking business, we may as well cut to the core. You needn't worry about this brand occupying your market. You need only be ready to aid me, and I will of course repay profits to you.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: What say you to this? For the first year on the market, we will remain wholly dependent on your marketing channels.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Hahaha... I could never. Ms. Lena and I are friends, and even if there was nothing in it for me, it's still right of me to lend an ear.
attributes.name: William

attributes.content: I'm just curious. Ms. Lena, do you also say this perfume has the potential to sustain a brand?
attributes.name: William

attributes.content: I wouldn't dare run my mouth. You're the connoisseur here, market-wise. As a perfumer, I can only give an evaluation of the work itself.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Wood-based perfumes have been fairly popular in recent years, and a 'taste of the exotic' easily sparks conversation. This perfume is no ordinary thing in itself, either. On the whole, it should be for you to judge, I think.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Mm, fair point, fair point. I'd also like to ask, where did you find this tree you're talking about?
attributes.name: William

attributes.content: How well you should ask. It's right on this hillside, not too fa—
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: A-HEM. Ms. Pallas, some things are best left unsaid for now, even to a partner in business.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Ha, haha. quite right. Let me think now, just have a think...
attributes.name: William

attributes.content: (Ah! He's casually pocketed the sample and leaf.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Well. Getting the land contract will take some ups and downs. Give me a few days. If I could just have the both of you stay patient and wait for word from me.
attributes.name: William

attributes.content: Don't do anything unilateral before I get back to you. I'll run along for now, goodbye...
attributes.name: William

attributes.content: Wellaway, acting really isn't a strength of mine... Did I speak any lines wrong during that?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: You didn't get a single one right.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Ohh. Woe...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I'm joking. You went a little walkabout with the script, but when someone's looking at everything to gain, it's hard for them to spot anything else.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Quite well done, Pallas. I think our goal's achieved now.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Market conspiracy is more enigmatic still than the art of the battlefield... What do we do next?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: What *do* we do? We might as well do as our friend said, go home to rest, and wait for now with peace of mind.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Found them, finally.
attributes.name: Lena

attributes.content: Golden sunflowers, often seen growing by the shore. The double-petaled kind have always been treated as a particular breed, but they should be another species in practice.
attributes.name: Lena

attributes.content: Though their looks and growth environments are very similar, they're completely different in bud form. If you smell them carefully, their scents are hugely different.
attributes.name: Lena

attributes.content: I think we'll give you your own name after all. Let's see... How about setting sunflowers?
attributes.name: Lena

attributes.content: The book says 'stoneflag leaves have curative properties on wounds.' That's not actually accurate at all.
attributes.name: Lena

attributes.content: It's the acidic liquid in the leaves that kills germs, in fact, but that has to do with the soil conditions too. Just blindly treating it as a medicinal plant is too sloppy.
attributes.name: Lena

attributes.content: There's so many mistakes in this book. If I picked at every one, I'd have enough to write a whole new book. I might as well write one myself, if I have the time.
attributes.name: Lena

attributes.content: If I have the time...
attributes.name: Lena

attributes.content: You could show anyone pyrargrass in the wild and bloodmoon cress in the florists, and nobody would ever imagine they used to be the same plant.
attributes.name: Lena

attributes.content: Pyrargrass adapted to an arid environment through shrinking its leaves into this minute form, but the seeds of both have retained the same shape.
attributes.name: Lena
Lena
attributes.content: Which also serves as evidence that this barren might have been far from what we see today a few hundred years ago. If this discovery ever—

attributes.name: Lena
attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... *cough*......
My strength's dropped off so hard lately.
attributes.name: Lena

attributes.content: Come on, Lena, you're not going to feel helpless yet! If the pyrargrass is going to live on so stubbornly, so can you.
attributes.name: Lena

attributes.text: If only... I was just another blade of nameless grass.
Would I be able to take root here too, without a care?

attributes.content: Three days later
If I recall, it was just around here.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Look over there.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Far off in the distance, the old tree on the hillside is as withered as a few days ago, but a crew of fully armed men guard it in rings.
And a vast, empty plot nearby has been fenced off, with a conspicuous placard posted to it.
'Private property, do not enter?'
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Well, the early fowl does get the worm, but the force Mr. William brings to bear has really blown me away. Mm, it's praiseworthy in a way.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Commendable spirit, too. Finding that one tree in so vast a forest using nothing more than a leaf.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: He wouldn't be satisfied, no matter the conditions we gave him—he wants this perfume all to himself. Sadly for him, I think he's out of luck this time.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I didn't use any daeluswood in that perfume sample. I just mixed a few plants together to mimic the scent and trick his nose. He can keep researching all he likes; all he'll get is a dead end.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Had you foreseen that, so far in advance?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I suppose you could say my family influenced me when I was young. I hate it, but I couldn't be more familiar with all that rhetoric and so-called 'business think' if I tried.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Anyhow, we should have no reason to worry now. If all goes well, then come next spring, this hillside will be covered in daeluswood saplings.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I know I hoodwinked him a little, and though you could call it punishment for plagiarizing my work before, I do still feel a little sorry.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: We'll see when I'm free enough to draw up a recipe that actually uses daeluswood, and I'll send it to him as a present.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Miss Lena. I have a question, in truth.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: If Minos truly did leave you with but disappointment and resentment as you said, then why is it you care so much for this one tree's fate?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: The flora can't speak. It simply takes root, deep in this great land. What kind of plant could truly live, away from the soil which nurtures it?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Besides, Pallas, you're wrong.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I have plenty of bad memories of my home, true. To this day, I can't find it in me to reconcile with my past. But still, how can I say I hate that land?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: My dream has never once changed. I want to leave beautiful things behind. Maybe in the distant future, there'll still be people who can take in that fragrance, thanks to my work.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Lena, it is time to return to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Mm, I've packed up every specimen I wanted to bring back. If you don't mind helping me carry on the return trip, dear Pallas.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Of course, I would be glad to assist. Is it the pouch by the doorway?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: It's the big trunk downstairs in the hotel.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Very... Very well. As a priestess, it is only expected that I should serve the Minoan people...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: That's right. Just like me, you've come far and away, landed yourself in an unfamiliar place, and picked up a different name, a different identity, and a different worth.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: The blizzards back home might have bitten like frost, but how do you really settle down and take up root, away from the warm sun and tender rains you knew?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: It was Minos that nurtured you, and you'll reshape Minos in time.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Goodbye for now.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: There'll come a day when I return home with you.
attributes.name: Perfumer
